Add complete Loop app MVP with real Google Places API integration

Major Features:
- 3-screen Snapchat-style navigation (Feed, Calendar, Friends)

- Real-time Google Places API (NEW v1) integration
- Calendar view with event management
- Friends system with Loop Score gamification
- Authentication flow (signup, login, onboarding)
- Supabase backend with PostGIS for location queries

Key Components:
- Recommendation engine with contextual scoring (location, time, feedback)
- Activity cards with transparent AI explanations
- Pull-to-refresh and loading states
- Haptic feedback throughout
- Comprehensive error handling with fallbacks

Technical Stack:
- React Native + Expo SDK 54
- TypeScript with strict mode
- Supabase (PostgreSQL + Auth + PostGIS)
- Google Places API (New) v1 with field masks for cost optimization
- Real location data integration

- Fixed Google Places API 400 error (maxResults: 50 â†’ 20)
